com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class FreeformShapeTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.AbstractPathTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.FreeformShapeTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class FreeformShapeTool
extends AbstractPathTool
    Tool allowing user to draw a free-form path (like a paintbrush) that is closed upon completion and can thusly be filled with paint.
